categori vi (protect area sustain use natur resources) meander kobuk river air locat northwest arctic borough, alaska, usa nearest&#160;c fairbank coordin 67°33′0″n 159°17′0″w﻿ / ﻿67.55000°n 159.28333°w﻿ / 67.55000; -159.28333coordinates: 67°33′0″n 159°17′0″w﻿ / ﻿67.55000°n 159.28333°w﻿ / 67.55000; -159.28333 area 1,750,716 acr (708,490&#160;ha)[1] establish decemb 2, 1980 visitor 11,485 (in&#160;2011)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic kobuk valley nation park northwestern alaska 25 mile (40&#160;km) north arctic circle. design unit state nation park 1980 alaska nation interest land conserv act. note great kobuk sand dune carib migrat routes. park offer backcountri camping, hiking, backpacking, dog sledding. design trail road park, 1,750,716 acr (2,735.49&#160;sq&#160;mi; 7,084.90&#160;km2), approxim size state delaware. park entir arctic circle. road lead park. reachabl foot, dogsled, snowmobile, charter air taxi nome kotzebu year-round. park one least visit nation park system.[2] content 1 geographi 2 ecolog 3 histori 4 refer 5 extern link geography[edit] park center vast ecosystem selawik nation wildlif refug noatak nation preserve. 75 mile (121&#160;km) river chukchi sea. gate arctic nation park preserv lie 32 mile (51&#160;km) east. park includ 81,000 acr (33,000&#160;ha) land own nativ corpor state alaska.[3] park consist broad wetland valley kobuk river run along southern edg western brook range, known baird mountains. boundari park run along height-of-land baird mountain north shorter ware mountain south form ring, defin enclos kobuk valley. middl two-third kobuk river, kiana ambler, includ park, sever major tributari salmon river hunt river. valley floor mainli cover glacial drift.[3] much southern portion park, south kobuk river, manag kobuk valley wilder 174,545 acr (70,636&#160;ha). selawik wilder lie south, adjoin selawik nation wildlif refuge.[4] three set sand dune field locat south side kobuk river. great kobuk sand dunes, littl kobuk sand dune hunt river dune remnant dunefield cover mani 200,000 acr (81,000&#160;ha) immedi retreat pleistocen glaciation. combin outwash deposit glacier strong wind creat field, mostli cover forest tundra. present time activ dune field cover 20,500 acr (8,300&#160;ha). great kobuk sand dune compris largest activ arctic dune field north america.[5] nasa fund studi analog martian polar dunes.[6] park' headquart northwest arctic heritag center kotzebue, 100 mile (160&#160;km) west park bere sea coast.[7] season ranger station oper along kobuk river kallarichuk, west end park, onion portag east end park.[8] offic visitor servic cape krusenstern nation monument noatak nation preserv facility.[9][10][11] unit manag togeth western arctic nation parklands, singl park servic superintend charge.[12] ecology[edit] park lie transit zone boreal forest tundra.[3] fish wildlif park typic arctic subarct fauna. major econom speci caribou, moose, fish speci salmon sheefish.[3] visibl anim 400,000 carib western arctic herd. herd migrat annual winter breed grounds, south ware mountains, summer calv grounds, north baird mountains. herd' annual cross kobuk river central inupiaq people' subsist hunting.[13] larg mammal park includ gray wolves, red foxes, carib moose. black bears, brown bears, beavers, river otters, canadian lynxes, dall' sheep exist park well. smaller mammal includ wolverines, martens, minks, porcupines, muskrats, snowsho hare varieti voles.[14] fish speci includ chinook, chum, pink sockey salmon, salmonid includ dolli varden, arctic char, lake trout arctic grayling. speci includ burbot, arctic lamprey, round, broad humpback whitefish, pond rainbow smelt.[15] weather park subject extremes. averag low temperatur januari −8&#160;°f (−22&#160;°c), reach nighttim low −50&#160;°f (−46&#160;°c). summer temperatur averag around 65&#160;°f (18&#160;°c), reach 85&#160;°f (29&#160;°c). sinc park arctic circle, sun set june 3 juli 9, sun visibl 1-1/2 hour winter solstice, long period twilight either side sunris sunset. case northern alaska, aurora boreali often visibl winter night solar activ high. snow happen time year. wind rain common summer.[16] history[edit] human habit kobuk valley believ extend back least 12,500 years. present inhabit valley inupiat people, subsist hunt fish region.[17] onion portag archeolog district nation histor landmark district east end kobuk river' cours park. site, strateg locat major carib river crossing, document nine cultur complex span 8,000–6,000 bc 1000–1700 ad.[13] site inhiold nana region corporation, alaskan nativ corpor right park.[3] first human inhabit kobuk valley peopl paleo-arct tradition, hunt carib onion portage. region appar desert 2,000 year peopl archaic tradit appear valley south east. 4,000 year present, peopl arctic small tool tradit arrived, depart 1,500 1,000 year ago, leav valley unoccupied. new peopl arriv 1200 ad, document ahteut site 25 mile (40&#160;km) downriv onion portage. peopl remain valley mid-19th century, carib popul declin peopl move closer coast. peopl akunirmiut kuuvaum kangiamirnuit. one villag locat present park mouth hunt river. descendents, known kuuvangmiit, mostli move park lands.[3] 32 prospectors' camp establish short gold rush 1899–1900. survey yet locat them, although debri associ miners' boat found.[3] kobuk valley nation park establish one fifteen new nation park servic properti establish alaska nation interest land conserv act (anilca) 1980. first declar nation monument presid jimmi carter decemb 1, 1978 use author antiqu act congression negoti propos anilca bill stalled. anilca final pass 1980, sign carter decemb 2, 1980. unlik mani park servic unit alaska, kobuk valley entir nation park land, subsist hunt local resid permitted. part park design nation preserve, would allow sport hunting.[18][19] kobuk sand dune great kobuk sand dune locat kobuk valley nation park northwestern arctic alaska. agi river kobuk valley nation park references[edit] ^ "list acreag decemb 31, 2011". land resourc division, nation park service. retriev 2012-03-07.&#160; ^ b "np
